name: Almond
headline: We make it easy to get great ObGyn care  in-person and over telehealth
description:
Almond is like One Medical but for women‚Äôs health: we make it easy to get great ObGyn care fast, both at our in-person offices and over telehealth.

The problem with traditional ObGyn practices is that physician time is misused, so patients get slow care. We're rebuilding back-office tech that saves physicians time, and we're hiring a wider range of care providers roles, which let us deliver better outcomes to patients and reduce the amount of time it takes to get their issue resolved.
tags: industry:consumer-health-services; industry:telehealth; industry:consumer; industry:healthcare; industry:femtech; location:los-angeles

founders.name: Tara Raffi, Founder
founders.description:
- McKinsey consultant; served large US hospital systems
- Early Ops and Marketing team member at Factual, a location-data tech company
- Built McKinsey‚Äôs internal tech incubator; grew fund to $50M invested globally and hired team of 5, focused on user-centered design and healthcare

founders.name: Carly Allen, Founder
founders.description: Carly Allen (Co-Founder & Chief Brand Officer of Almond) built her career in CAA's marketing division. Her background is in marketing and entertainment. She was Head of Production for global campaigns for brands like Coca-Cola, Nike, Marriott, Chipotle, and Bonobos, among others. Her focus has been in building purpose driven brands, which is desperately needed in the ObGyn space. Her late father was an ObGyn so she is deeply connected to this space.

# The kind of care that takes your health seriously
ObGyn care that moves beyond treating symptoms to solving problems ‚Äî working with your schedule, your needs, and your goals.
[ Book First Visit ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/new-member-visit-reasons>)

# The kind of care that takes your health seriously
ObGyn care that moves beyond treating symptoms to solving problems ‚Äî working with your schedule, your needs, and your goals.
[ Book First Visit ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>) [ Book Intro Call ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/almondhealth.as.me/schedule.php?appointmentType=60391979>)
# ObGyn care ‚Äî reimagined by women.
## 75% of American women are unsatisfied with their ObGyn care.
We are tired of being told our discomfort is ‚Äúnormal‚Äù, of short answers and long wait times, and of the fear that we‚Äôre not getting great care. We are tired of feeling our health is not important because it doesn‚Äôt fit into crammed 10-minute visits. So we built something different, where women are heard, have control over their choices, and benefit from a broader range of evidence-based medicine. This is women‚Äôs healthcare built by women.
[ Book Now ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/new-member-visit-reasons>)
[ Learn More ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/</classic-membership>)
#### Membership Includes
[üë©üèΩ‍‚öïÔ∏è Full-scope ObGyn careüì± Anytime online bookingüé• Same-day video visitsüòé Weekend & evening visitsüí¨ Unlimited texting with Care Teamüë©üèΩ‍‚öïÔ∏è Best-in-class integrative practitioners](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/scheduling?utm_source=web&utm_medium=landing_page&utm_campaign=virtual_visits_landing_page&utm_content=general_wellness>)
üíä Easy prescription refills
üìù Personalized care plans after every visit
üë©üèΩ‍üî¨ Easy, comfortable, and on-site lab work
üîç More comprehensive testing
‚úÖ Major insurance plans accepted
![A cell phone is open to a text message from a doctor.](https://lirp.cdn-website.com/d893c11c/dms3rep/multi/opt/SMS-full-763h.png)
### Unlimited texting, direct with your Care Team
When you become an Almond ObGyn member, you can now text your Care Team directly from your phone. We can all benefit from fewer hurdles to getting health care when it‚Äôs most needed.
[ Book Now ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/new-member-visit-reasons?routingConfigId=initialNewMember>)
![A cell phone with a text message between two people.](https://lirp.cdn-website.com/d893c11c/dms3rep/multi/opt/sms-half-e0747e56-1920w.png)
![A row of orange stars on a white background.](https://lirp.cdn-website.com/d893c11c/dms3rep/multi/opt/5+stars-214w.png)
[5.0 Google Review Rating](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/www.google.com/search?sca_esv=099d353e2e922eb4&q=Almond%20ObGyn&stick=H4sIAAAAAAAAAONgU1I1qLAwSDZKSjNPSjIxNU4zN0ixMqgwNjNNTjMzMzJJTUqxTDNJXsTK45iTm5-XouCf5F6ZBwAwyYFKOAAAAA&mat=CcjWb5mlhikO&ved=2ahUKEwj-3LSj95eFAxU2I0QIHZG3B3sQrMcEegQIKBAH#lrd=0x80c2bf7bb453f70d:0x365cf6624ebd9f4c,1,,,,1>)
# What Real Almond Members Are Saying
### Berhann B.
A row of black stars on a white background.
"Best OBGYN experience I ever had. All the staff and doctors are so friendly and knowledgeable. The atmosphere is great. Also us Black women often get the short end of the stick as medical patients and that was NOT the case at Almond. This experience was such a relief. I felt valued the entire time. I love it here 10/10!"
### Shani B.
A row of black stars on a white background.
"Gorgeous, soothing, relaxing, clean and bright clinic space aside... this is the best MEDICAL CARE I've ever received... I feel so lucky to live nearby and can't wait to watch Almond grow so more women can be this blessed. I'll be a patient for life. 100 stars!"
### Elle V.
A row of black stars on a white background.
"10/10 - what I loved most about my experience was the cohesive display of active listening and care I received from everyone at the clinic. I truly felt empathy for my care and trust that my team will attentively and carefully come up with a plan to help me feel better."
[ Read More Google Reviews ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/www.google.com/search?sca_esv=099d353e2e922eb4&q=Almond%20ObGyn&stick=H4sIAAAAAAAAAONgU1I1qLAwSDZKSjNPSjIxNU4zN0ixMqgwNjNNTjMzMzJJTUqxTDNJXsTK45iTm5-XouCf5F6ZBwAwyYFKOAAAAA&mat=CcjWb5mlhikO&ved=2ahUKEwj-3LSj95eFAxU2I0QIHZG3B3sQrMcEegQIKBAH#lrd=0x80c2bf7bb453f70d:0x365cf6624ebd9f4c,1,,,,1>)
# How does Almond Work?
### Don‚Äôt just get seen, get taken care of.
Document
![Timeline curve](https://lirp.cdn-website.com/d893c11c/dms3rep/multi/opt/carv-imgbg-2-1920w.png)
1
**EASY BOOKING** Book online from anywhere, including same-day video visits for when it can‚Äôt wait.
2
**IN-DEPTH VISITS** Share the questions on your mind in your onboarding form in as much detail as you feel comfortable so we can use your visit time in the best way possible.
3
**THE BEST IN CARE** Work with the best in the business who believe in a functional, integrative approach to your health.
4
**EVERYTHING ON-SITE** Lab work is all done in our space on-site rather than having you run around town.
5
**CUSTOMIZED PLANS** Every appointment is followed up with a handwritten care plan for you, so you don‚Äôt need to take notes or worry about missing anything.
6
**REAL SUPPORT** Message our team at any time with whatever questions you have.
# What can we help you with?
### We offer the best of traditional western medicine & integrative medicine to help you stay healthier, longer.
### Annual Well Woman
Yearly preventive care check in & planning for your health goals. Includes a Pap if needed. 
[Book Now](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>)
### Birth Control 
Counseling to find the right method, prescription refills, plus IUD insertion or removal.
[Book Now](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>)
### Vaginal Infections
Treatment for yeast infections, BV, or unexplained discharge, odor, or pelvic pain.
[Book Now](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>)
### Vulvar Skin Symptoms
Treatment for symptoms like lesions, ulcers, or bumps.
[Book Now](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>)
### STI Testing & Treatment
Routine checks and same day discreet video screenings available. 
[Book Now](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>)
### Period Management
Care for painful symptoms and an action plan to manage them.
[Book Now](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>)
### Perimenopause/Menopause
Help managing discomfort and tools for navigating your body‚Äôs changes without hearing it‚Äôs ‚Äúnormal‚Äù or feeling dismissed.
[Book Now](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>)
### Preconception & Fertility
We‚Äôre here to answer all your questions and point you in the right direction.
[Book Now](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>)
### General Visit
Have something else going on? We‚Äôre here to help.
[Book Now](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>)
### Annual Well Woman
Yearly preventive care check in & planning for your health goals. Includes a Pap if needed. 
[Book Now](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>)
### Birth Control 
Counseling to find the right method, prescription refills, plus IUD insertion or removal.
[Book Now](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>)
We accept most major PPO insurance plans, including: Aetna, Cigna, United Healthcare, Anthem BlueCross, Blue Shield of California.
# Specialized care for when you need it most
Personalized and thorough care ‚Äî coordinated by our expert team of ObGyns, nurses, midwives and health coaches
A DEEP DIVE into your health
## The PCOS Program
The PCOS Program is designed to go deep to address the root causes of PCOS, design a custom treatment plan, check in proactively on progress, and adapt as needed with a collaborative team of experts. Includes one year of our full-scope Gynecology Membership.
[ Get Started ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/almondhealth.as.me/PCOS-Membership-Registration-Call>)
[ Learn More ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/</the-pcos-membership>)
A 12 MONTH GUIDED JOURNEY
## Group Pregnancy Care
Group Pregnancy Care is 12 month guided program. Together with excellent doctors, deeply skilled midwives, and a community, we build a supportive nest that delivers better outcomes. This is how pregnancy care should be.
[ Get Started ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/almondhealth.as.me/maternity-care-intro-call>)
[ Learn More ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/</group-pregnancy-care>)
From your baseline to your best
## Baseline
Get 35+ lab tests, designed especially for women, with personalized insights from an ObGyn. Know the story of your body so you can write its future.
[ Join Now ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/demographic?is_new_member=true&product=baseline>)
[ Learn More ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/</baseline>)
# The care you deserve‚Äîcovered by insurance
Become an Almond member ‚Äî HSA/FSA accepted. Visits covered by insurance.
For visit costs we accept most major PPO insurance plans, including: Aetna, Cigna, United Healthcare, Anthem BlueCross, Blue Shield of California.
[ Book Now ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/book.almondobgyn.com/welcome>)
[ Book an Intro Call ](https://www.almondobgyn.com/<https:/almondhealth.as.me/schedule.php?appointmentType=60391979>)
# ‚ÄúSuch an amazing experience. I will definitely be back.‚Äù

## Frequently Asked Questions
These are some of the questions we get most often ‚Äì but ask us anything!
  * What are my options for abortion?
  * Does Almond offer fertility services
  * Does Almond offer maternity care?
  * Will Almond accept my insurance?
  * How does membership work?
  * What are the different options for birth control?


  * How can I best treat PCOS?
  * How can I get my hormones tested
  * What should I do about painful periods?﻿
  * How can I manage menopause symptoms?

# ObGyn care ‚Äî reimagined by women.
## 75% of American women are unsatisfied with their ObGyn care.
We are tired of being told our discomfort is ‚Äúnormal‚Äù, of short answers and long wait times, and of the fear that we‚Äôre not getting great care. We are tired of feeling our health is not important because it doesn‚Äôt fit into crammed 10-minute visits. So we built something different, where women are heard, have control over their choices, and benefit from a broader range of evidence-based medicine. This is women‚Äôs healthcare built by women.
 Book Now ‚ü®26‚ü©
 Learn More ‚ü®8‚ü©

# What Real Almond Members Are Saying
### Berhann B.
A row of black stars on a white background.
"Best OBGYN experience I ever had. All the staff and doctors are so friendly and knowledgeable. The atmosphere is great. Also us Black women often get the short end of the stick as medical patients and that was NOT the case at Almond. This experience was such a relief. I felt valued the entire time. I love it here 10/10!"
### Shani B.
A row of black stars on a white background.
"Gorgeous, soothing, relaxing, clean and bright clinic space aside... this is the best MEDICAL CARE I've ever received... I feel so lucky to live nearby and can't wait to watch Almond grow so more women can be this blessed. I'll be a patient for life. 100 stars!"
### Elle V.
A row of black stars on a white background.
"10/10 - what I loved most about my experience was the cohesive display of active listening and care I received from everyone at the clinic. I truly felt empathy for my care and trust that my team will attentively and carefully come up with a plan to help me feel better."
 Read More Google Reviews ‚ü®33‚ü©
# How does Almond Work?
### Don‚Äôt just get seen, get taken care of.
Document
![Timeline curve‚ü®34‚ü©]
1
**EASY BOOKING** Book online from anywhere, including same-day video visits for when it can‚Äôt wait.
2
**IN-DEPTH VISITS** Share the questions on your mind in your onboarding form in as much detail as you feel comfortable so we can use your visit time in the best way possible.
3
**THE BEST IN CARE** Work with the best in the business who believe in a functional, integrative approach to your health.
4
**EVERYTHING ON-SITE** Lab work is all done in our space on-site rather than having you run around town.
5
**CUSTOMIZED PLANS** Every appointment is followed up with a handwritten care plan for you, so you don‚Äôt need to take notes or worry about missing anything.
6
**REAL SUPPORT** Message our team at any time with whatever questions you have.
# What can we help you with?
### We offer the best of traditional western medicine & integrative medicine to help you stay healthier, longer.
### Annual Well Woman
Yearly preventive care check in & planning for your health goals. Includes a Pap if needed. 
Book Now‚ü®28‚ü©
### Birth Control 
Counseling to find the right method, prescription refills, plus IUD insertion or removal.
Book Now‚ü®28‚ü©
### Vaginal Infections
Treatment for yeast infections, BV, or unexplained discharge, odor, or pelvic pain.
Book Now‚ü®28‚ü©
### Vulvar Skin Symptoms
Treatment for symptoms like lesions, ulcers, or bumps.
Book Now‚ü®28‚ü©
### STI Testing & Treatment
Routine checks and same day discreet video screenings available. 
Book Now‚ü®28‚ü©
### Period Management
Care for painful symptoms and an action plan to manage them.
Book Now‚ü®28‚ü©
### Perimenopause/Menopause
Help managing discomfort and tools for navigating your body‚Äôs changes without hearing it‚Äôs ‚Äúnormal‚Äù or feeling dismissed.
Book Now‚ü®28‚ü©
### Preconception & Fertility
We‚Äôre here to answer all your questions and point you in the right direction.
Book Now‚ü®28‚ü©
### General Visit
Have something else going on? We‚Äôre here to help.
Book Now‚ü®28‚ü©
### Annual Well Woman
Yearly preventive care check in & planning for your health goals. Includes a Pap if needed. 
Book Now‚ü®28‚ü©
### Birth Control 
Counseling to find the right method, prescription refills, plus IUD insertion or removal.
Book Now‚ü®28‚ü©
We accept most major PPO insurance plans, including: Aetna, Cigna, United Healthcare, Anthem BlueCross, Blue Shield of California.
# Specialized care for when you need it most
Personalized and thorough care ‚Äî coordinated by our expert team of ObGyns, nurses, midwives and health coaches
A DEEP DIVE into your health
## The PCOS Program
The PCOS Program is designed to go deep to address the root causes of PCOS, design a custom treatment plan, check in proactively on progress, and adapt as needed with a collaborative team of experts. Includes one year of our full-scope Gynecology Membership.
 Get Started ‚ü®35‚ü©
 Learn More ‚ü®12‚ü©
A 12 MONTH GUIDED JOURNEY
## Group Pregnancy Care
Group Pregnancy Care is 12 month guided program. Together with excellent doctors, deeply skilled midwives, and a community, we build a supportive nest that delivers better outcomes. This is how pregnancy care should be.
 Get Started ‚ü®36‚ü©
 Learn More ‚ü®10‚ü©
From your baseline to your best
## Baseline
Get 35+ lab tests, designed especially for women, with personalized insights from an ObGyn. Know the story of your body so you can write its future.
 Join Now ‚ü®37‚ü©

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Almond**

Founded in 2021 and situated in Los Angeles, CA, Almond is shaking up the traditional landscape of ObGyn care. Their mission is straightforward: to simplify access to quality ObGyn services both in-person and through telehealth. Think of Almond as "One Medical for women's health," aiming to deliver rapid, effective care.

### The Problem

Conventional ObGyn practices often fall short; physician time tends to be poorly utilized, leading to frustratingly slow patient care. Almond is tackling this head-on by revamping back-office technology and expanding the types of care providers they employ. This approach not only enables faster service but also improves patient outcomes.

### Team and Structure

Almond is part of Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch S22 and boasts a small but dedicated team of eight employees, all working toward a common goal of enhancing women's healthcare. Led by their Group Partner, Nan, the team focuses on creating an environment where all women are heard and valued.

### Services Offered

Almond's offerings include:

- **Classic and Virtual Memberships:** Tailored care options that cater to women's specific health needs.
- **Group Pregnancy Care:** A unique community-based program that enhances the pregnancy experience.
- **Specialized Programs:** Including PCOS management, menopause support, and personalized health coaching. 

All services are designed to provide comprehensive care that moves beyond just treating symptoms. Almond believes in holistic and empowering healthcare, emphasizing a deep understanding of individual needs.

### Unique Approach

What sets Almond apart? Not only do they provide unlimited texting with care team members and same-day video visits, but their model also integrates traditional and alternative medicine approaches. Their goal is to minimize obstacles to healthcare and make it as accessible as possible.

### Customer Sentiment

The feedback from their patients has been overwhelmingly positive. Almond enjoys a stellar reputation, with many testimonials praising their attentive service and welcoming environment. 

### Conclusion

Overall, Almond represents a refreshing take on ObGyn care. By harnessing technology, fostering community, and prioritizing patient satisfaction, they are transforming how women access and experience healthcare. If you're looking for compassionate care that puts your health first, Almond is worth considering.

Visit their website for more information: [Almond ObGyn](https://www.almondobgyn.com/).
